column2: I would reccomend coming here during happy hour
column4: and only during happy hour. Uchi's menu is comprised of both cold and hot tastings
column9: you'll easily spend 70 to 80+ (unless you do one of the set courses) to leave satisfied. The Sake Social menu includes a pretty large variety of smaller versions of the standard menu items at a very reasonable price. Ordering mostly off of the Happy Hour menu and a few select things from the standard menu will ensure you have a filling
